review_data.content: Craving for ramen in Zürich? This is the place for the authentic Japanesse Ramen. Very small restaurant in the heart of Zürich city. Since the place is really small sometimes quite impossible to get a table over diner time. Either you come earlier or later....More

review_data.title: Always...
review_data.content: ...worth a visit. I love the ramen, very spicy and tasty. The restaurant is very small, lovely with a cool atmosphere. Try it out.

review_data.title: Very good and absolutely authentic

review_data.title: Authentic ramen
review_data.content: The ramen here is great and authentic Japanese flavours. The noodles and broth are great and very tasty - the pork in the soup is flavoursome as well. Unfortunately they were out of Tokyo ramen! :( Prices start at 19CHF for a bowl of ramen...More

review_data.title: Real Authentic Japanese Ramen

review_data.title: Authentic Japanese - No Sushi
review_data.content: This tiny Japanese noodle restaurant is located in a small side street near Zurich Stauffacher. It mainly serves noodle soups and curries.
